title: Strengthening App Development Practical Skills: Strategies for Applying Learning Representative Systems to Bridge Learning Opportunity Gaps

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education and professional field practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can understand learning representative system operations and propose two or more field-applicable strategies
Learners can write peer learning gap analysis reports using digital tools
Learners can design a three-phase process to resolve issues encountered when performing learning representative roles in blended environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
